question: Is divorce valid by force?
answer:
QUESTION
Is divorce valid if a man is forced to divorce his wife at gunpoint? Someone told me Imam abu hanifah says in coersion ( by force) divorce is VALID. Imam Malik says by FORCE ( in coercion) divorce is not valid. Is this true?
ANSWER


Share:
According to Imaam Abu Hanifa (RA), verbal divorce by Ikraah (force) is valid.

A victim may issue the divorce only in writing. In this case, the written divorce will not be valid.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
